description: Try our easy to follow Stir-Fried Chicken on Crispy Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: StirFried Chicken on Crispy Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir remaining oyster sauce and sesame oil into marinade and add to wok. Bring to the boil. Cook for 1 minute until thickened. Top noodles with chicken. Garnish with reserved spring onion. Serve.
